title: alien-isolation-offer
description: The Epic Store and Steam Store are offering an 80% discount on "Alien: Isolation" until the end of July.

title: nfs-unbound-promo
description: The Steam Store is offering an 86% discount on Need for Speed: Unbound.

title: sifu-available-now
description: "Sifu," the martial arts-based video game, is now available on both the Epic and Steam stores.
